segments.text: How will you spend this lovely weekend ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I have no idea , any suggestions ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We haven't played chess for a long time . How about playing chess ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It must be fun . But you know , I am not good at chess . I never won since I've learnt to play chess .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Don â€™ t worry , I will teach you how to win .
segments.speaker: S1
